showerReviews.reviewText: 5:00 am no shower cleaned, not available, I don't know what happen in this pilot flying j truck stop, nobody wants to work

… want to check your truck tires, air is available in all diesel pumps and plenty of parking. Don't know anything about showers because I did not shower here. I showered earlier in Tennessee, but that's another truck stop, story, and review.
Dirty, my shower was not clean, all it looked like was they went in and put the toilet seat up. …

The water when I went to take a shower was cold and I had it set on hot and I kept adjusting to see if it would get warm at least but never did. The toilet in the bathroom was not clean at all. I found hair all over the toilet seat under …
6/16Great employees. Did not use shower but management was refreshingly friendly. Clean area. Food looked fresh and tasted fresh too. Denny's here too. Lot was big and easy to maneuver arounf

showerReviews.reviewText: … the pumps even the card readers said Pilot. I asked if I’m able to use my pilot card. He said yes. I said even for a shower. He replied with “I already said you could use it.” After my shower I got food. I went to claim an offer for a free …

… pilot to visit. The bathrooms are clean. The inside of the store and parking lot are clean. They have a kitchen where you can order food. Unfortunately mobile codes don’t work for fuel. You can’t get shower codes on your phone as well.
This is not a pilot here from pilot, only a gas station, you won’t be able to take a shower here according to your rewards.
… The separate shower and laundry area away from public restrooms is nice also and I am sure the OTR drivers appreciate it.
The showers have a creepy Norman Bates, feel! Whoever designed these showers should’ve been fired. …

… HOWEVER  if you are looking for a great shower experience then DO NOT come here.  I arrived checked in for prime parking  the evening crew made me feel like I was bothering them.  So rather discuss the matter I went back to my truck and …

Great customer service, if there's any kind of line their opening up another register for fast service! Plus everyone I talked to was super helpful and friendly. Great shower. Easy parking. Lots of cool things to buy! Great truckstop all …
Great service, good prices.  Wife is in wheel chair and needs assistance, was allowed to use truckers shower.  Very helpful.   Would recommend any Pilot station for your needs.
stopped in long enough to shower. 1.5hr & still had to pay the 18$ for paid parking. what happened to the first 2hrs free?

locations.content: Southern Pride Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Truck drivers check your fuel receipt because they do extra charge. They add a 10$ shower, but i didn't ask for shower. And the same thing happened with another guy from our company.I am not going to use this truck stop for Fuel any more.
Free shower with 100 gallons of Diesel Fuel

Outstanding Mom and Pop Truck Plaza! Parking LOT, store, shower, all SUPER Clean! Just spoke to a gentleman tonight 03-06-2019, he is projecting to open a small home cook meal and BBQ restraunt here on April 1st. The food we were discussing …
Nice shower, nice people!! Pretty big parking lot, the restaurant inside is also good (pizza joint). Definitely saving to GPS
I'd rather pay 10 bucks for a shower here than get a free one from loves/ pilot
Good old-fashioned Mom and pop's truck stop plenty of parking at 9 at night... Shower was clean and staff is very friendly..
Nice clerk, clean hot shower, definitely recommend them.
Shower have hot water. Very clean
10 dollar shower and 9 dollar ground beef pizza
Real truck stop free shower with fuel
